short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable the hover sidebar in Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The sidebar in Notion is a great way to navigate between pages, but it can be distracting when you're working between windows. This Chrome extension prevents the sidebar from appearing on hover.
